org.jacorb.orb

Class BufferManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jacorb.orb.AbstractBufferManager
      • org.jacorb.orb.BufferManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IBufferManager
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    JDK15NonSyncBufferManager

    public class BufferManager
extends AbstractBufferManager
    A BufferManager is used to share a pool of buffers and to implement a buffer allocation policy. This reduces the number of memory allocations and deallocations and the overall memory footprint. Buffers are generally created on demand.
    Author:
    Gerald Brose
